title: Authorizes city of Yonkers to establish one or more transportation improvement districts
summary: Authorizes the city of Yonkers to establish one or more transportation improvement districts to improve transportation in certain critical areas of the city.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2552

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 19, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. PRETLOW -- read once and referred to the Commit-
         tee on Cities

       AN ACT to authorize the city of Yonkers to  establish  a  transportation
         improvement  district or districts for the purpose of improving trans-
         portation in certain critical areas of such city

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Notwithstanding any provision of law to the contrary, but
    2  to the extent practicable, in accordance with the general city law,  the
    3  city  of  Yonkers,  acting  by  and  through its city council, is hereby
    4  authorized  to  establish  and  operate  a  transportation   improvement
    5  district  or  transportation improvement districts within such city. The
    6  purpose of such district or districts shall be to improve transportation
    7  within certain critical areas of the city of Yonkers including, but  not
    8  limited  to  the  Tuckahoe  road corridor, the Yonkers raceway area, the
    9  Nepperhan/Saw Mill industrial valley area,  the  northern  and  southern
   10  waterfront development areas, the Riverdale avenue corridor, the Yonkers
   11  avenue corridor and neighborhood commercial corridors.
   12    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03060-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to authorize the city of Yonkers to establish a transportation improvement district or districts for the purpose of improving transportation in certain critical areas of such city
